00032 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionButton::OptionButton(const char* caption){
00033   LOGW("You are creating a OptionButton without an Icon");
00034   this->setCaption(caption);
00035   foxPanelId=-1;
00036 }

00059 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionButton::setCaption(const char* caption){
00060   if (strlen(caption)==0){
00061     LOGW("You are setting an empty caption");
00062   }
00063   this->m_caption=caption;
00064 }
00065 
00073 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionButton::setIconFilename(const char* filename){
00074   if (strlen(filename)==0){
00075     LOGW("You are setting an empty icon filename");
00076   }
00077   this->m_iconFilename=filename;
00078 }

00138 RainbruRPG::Options::tOptionAttributeList*

00150 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionButton::update(){
00151 
00152   tOptionAttributeList::const_iterator iter;
00153 
00154   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00155   for (iter=attrbList.begin(); iter != attrbList.end(); iter++){
00156     (*iter)->update();
00157   }
00158 }
